{"id":1094280222,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 weeks, 1 day","timestamp":1699431392,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1094280222/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Determine if a Cell Is Reachable at a Given Time","memory":"6.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isReachableAtTime(int sx, int sy, int fx, int fy, int t) {\n        if(sx==fx && sy==fy) return t!=1; // If t=1 then we can move to the adjcent cell and then we cannot move back in time\n        int x_dist=abs(sx-fx),y_dist=abs(sy-fy);\n        return t>=max(x_dist,y_dist);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"determine-if-a-cell-is-reachable-at-a-given-time","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
